âœ¨ Laser_control | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automated laser targeting of mosquitoes, weeds, and pests for neutralization.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Mosquito, weed, and pest neutralization using a laser â€¢ Target detection using computer vision (Haar cascades, YOLOv4-tiny) â€¢ Galvanometer control for laser aiming â€¢ Raspberry Pi/Jetson Nano implementation
ðŸ“– Summary: The Laser_control repository details the development of a laser-based system for neutralizing mosquitoes, weeds, and pests. It uses computer vision (OpenCV, Darknet-YOLO) on a Raspberry Pi or Jetson Nano to detect targets and aims a low-power laser using galvanometer-controlled mirrors. The system is intended for outdoor use and emphasizes safety due to the potential hazards of laser technology.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ DockerWakeUp | Shell
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Reverse proxying Dockerized applications with on-demand container startup and idle shutdown for resource conservation.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ On-Demand Container Startup â€¢ Intelligent Idle Management â€¢ Automatic NGINX Configuration â€¢ Zero-Downtime Experience â€¢ Resource Efficient
ðŸ“– Summary: Docker Wake-Up is a system that automatically starts Docker containers when they are accessed via HTTP requests and stops them when idle to conserve resources. It also generates NGINX configurations for reverse proxying, including SSL setup, making it easier to manage and access Dockerized applications.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ YAPP_Box | OpenSCAD
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Creating custom enclosures for electronic projects using OpenSCAD.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Parametric project box generation â€¢ Customizable dimensions (length, width, height, thickness) â€¢ Cutout creation on all sides (front, back, left, right, base, lid) â€¢ PCB standoff support â€¢ Ridge for base and lid overlap
ðŸ“– Summary: YAPP_Box is an OpenSCAD project that generates customizable project boxes or enclosures. It allows users to define the dimensions of their PCB and other parameters to create a tailored enclosure with cutouts for connectors and other components.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ siyuan | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Personal knowledge management
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Privacy-first design â€¢ Self-hosted â€¢ Fully open source â€¢ Note-taking â€¢ Knowledge base management
ðŸ“– Summary: SiYuan is a privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open-source personal knowledge management system. It's built with TypeScript and Go, offering features like note-taking, knowledge base creation, and markdown support, with integrations for various services and tools.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ Dayflow | Swift
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automatically generating a timeline of daily computer activity for productivity tracking and review.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Automatic timeline generation â€¢ 1 FPS screen recording â€¢ 15-minute analysis intervals â€¢ Watch timelapses of your day â€¢ Auto storage cleanup
ðŸ“– Summary: Dayflow is a macOS application built with SwiftUI that automatically generates a timeline of your day by recording your screen activity at 1 FPS and analyzing it every 15 minutes using AI. It offers features like distraction highlights, automatic storage cleanup, and the option to use either Gemini (with your own API key) or local models (Ollama/LM Studio) for AI processing, emphasizing user privacy and data ownership.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ elasticsearch | Java
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Distributed search and analytics engine for production-scale workloads.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Distributed search and analytics â€¢ Scalable data store â€¢ Vector database â€¢ Full-text search â€¢ Logs analysis
ðŸ“– Summary: Elasticsearch is a distributed search and analytics engine built on Java. It provides scalable data storage and vector database capabilities optimized for speed and relevance, enabling use cases like full-text search, logs analysis, metrics monitoring, application performance monitoring, and security log analysis.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ professional-programming | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Providing a structured learning path and resources for software engineers to improve their skills and knowledge across various domains.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Curated list of must-read books and articles â€¢ Categorized resources covering various topics like algorithms, API design, career growth, and databases
ðŸ“– Summary: The repository is a curated collection of learning resources for software engineers aiming to enhance their professional skills. It covers a wide range of topics, from fundamental computer science concepts to software architecture, best practices, and career growth strategies, providing a comprehensive guide for continuous learning and development.
